blogPost.excerpt: GetMyInvoices is the central invoice management software for your company. The solution automatically retrieves invoices & other documents from thousands of sources – from portals over email postboxes and cloud storages to scanned documents. 14 Days FREE Trial
blogPost.body: GetMyInvoices is the central invoice management software for your company. The solution automatically retrieves invoices & other documents from thousands of sources – from portals over email postboxes and cloud storages to scanned documents. 14 Days FREE Trial
blogPost.title: GetMyInvoices.com - Automatically retrieve invoices & docs from thousand sources
blogPost.author: GetMyInvoices

localize.description: GetMyInvoices是贵公司的中央发票管理软件。该解决方案自动检索发票和其他文件从成千上万的来源 - 从门户网站的电子邮件邮箱和云存储到扫描文件。14天免费试用
localize.tagline: 从上千个来源自动检索发票和文件。

localize.description: GetMyInvoices是貴公司的中央發票管理軟件。該解決方案自動檢索發票和其他文件從成千上萬的來源 - 從門戶網站的電子郵件郵箱和雲存儲到掃描文件。14天免費試用
localize.tagline: 從上千個來源自動檢索發票和文件。

previous.excerpt: Open Design is the first developer toolkit to read, change, and display data from design files 📤 Process any Figma, Sketch, PSD, AI, or XD file via API 📥 Get design data in a unified JSON format 🛠 Build automations and tools to improve design workflows
previous.title: Open Design - Dev toolkit to read, change & display data from design files

localize.description: Open Design是第一个从设计文件中读取、更改和显示数据的开发者工具包 📤 通过API处理任何Figma、Sketch、PSD、AI或XD文件 📥 以统一的JSON格式获取设计数据 🛠 构建自动化和工具以改善设计工作流程。
localize.tagline: 从设计文件中读取、更改和显示数据的开发工具包。

localize.description: Open Design是第一個從設計文件中讀取、更改和顯示數據的開發者工具包 📤 通過API處理任何Figma、Sketch、PSD、AI或XD文件 📥 以統一的JSON格式獲取設計數據 🛠 構建自動化和工具以改善設計工作流程。
localize.tagline: 從設計文件中讀取、更改和顯示數據的開發工具包。
